"A.P.242/3/10/14:00": "They are Photoners. The cornerstone of the ARKS."
"They are the original [Profound Darkness]. The source of the Dark Falz's power."
"All efforts are wasted, scattered to nothingness."
"Therefore, a power that was not born of them is required in order to defeat them."
"That is why you and I exist. The final hope left by Xion."
"I had some errands to take care of. But first, you should tend to the others."
"I'm alright... But if we don't treat Sukuna-hime and Kotoshiro..."

"Sorry for not keeping in touch.
We've got a little...
no, we've got a huge problem."
"The Photoners are on the move. It's on an overwhelming level compared to what we've seen up until now... They plan to wipe us out completely."
"Invaders in The Land of Black and White"
